attributes.action: Save the Plymouth Civic Centre, oh, and can we have a loan...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After 50 years of poor maintenance the Civic Centre in Plymouth is up to be Grade 2 listed. Problem is the poor maintenance means it needs some money spent. But its probably better to refurb it than destroy it and replace it with a bar, a shop and a drop in centre for druggies. I propose we save it and that the nice new Prime Minister finds some funds to help.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
